DOCU_Docu.DOC:
=Actions=
Following actions are supported for Openstack.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.ACTION.LOGIN Action Description: This action is the entry point to all the Openstack services and is used to generate a token.To access the Identity service, user must know its URL. This token is further send as an authorization header to access any other Openstack service.The result of this action will be an XML which will be stored in the VARA PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.VARA.LOGIN_SESSIONS against the key (which will also gets published incase of success) as UC4RB_OPS_LOGIN_INFO_KEY
